attributes.action: Appoint new Secretary of State for Health and Social Care
attributes.additional_details:
Give same priority to cancer patients and other serious and fatal illnesses as covid.
Thousands of people will have late diagnosis, late treatment and it might be too late then.
attributes.background: After Matt's Hancock speach about how cancer patients need to wait for treatment and diagnosis until covid is controlled its clear we need someone else making these decisions, all lifes matter and cancer has a bigger fatality rate than Covid.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or to resign, or to be replaced.

You may wish to sign this petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552734
